thread.title: MarshaKaunitz

author: MarshaKaunitz
title: MarshaKaunitz
text: I ordered flowers to be delivered on the same day as my order. I had the flowers go to her home since she was supposed to be release from the hospital after her appendectomy. The delivery person could not gain access to her building in downtown Albany, NY so he called her (I had provided a phone number). He found out that she was still in the hospital. His response was that he was heading over with other flowers and he would deliver the flowers to her. The flowers were beautiful and my sister was very happy.
